name: Moogle Ribbon
effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 30%

name: Moogle Ribbon
莫古利的緞帶
모그의 리본
Ruban de mog
Mogry-Band
Cinta de moguri
desc_short: Boost DEF by 10% and resistance to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone
提高10%防禦的數值+提高異常狀態耐性
방어력 10% 상승+독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승
Augmente la DEF de 10% et la rés. À poi., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri.
Erhöht ABW um 10% und Resist. gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein.
Aumenta DEF un 10% y la res. al ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie
desc_long: Boosts DEF by 10%, and boosts poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance.
提高10%防禦的數值，並提高異常狀態耐性。
방어력이 10% 상승하고, 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente la DEF de 10% et la résistance à poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification.
Erhöht ABW um 10% und Resist. gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein.
Aumenta la DEF un 10% y la resistencia al veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra.
